welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ormesson-sur-Marne, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may require registration or a limited time usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
